Individual Modules¶

rnalysis.filtering

This module can import HTCount and DESeq .csv files, perform various filtering operations on them, perform set operations (union, intersection, etc), run basic exploratory analyses and plots (such as PCA, clustergram, violin plots, scatter, etc), save the filtered files to the computer, and return set of features that appear in an imported DESeq file.

rnalysis.enrichment

This module receives a set of feature names, and can perform various enrichment analyses on them, such as GO enrichment, tissue/phenotype enrichment, enrichment and depletion of Reference Table attributes, etc.

rnalysis.general

This module contains general-purpose functions, such as loading and saving files, removing table rows with no WBGene index, identifying type of input variables, etc.
